:py:mod:`ParamsIzhikevich`
==========================

.. py:module:: ParamsIzhikevich


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   ParamsIzhikevich.ParamsIzhikevich




.. py:class:: ParamsIzhikevich(peak_potential: float, alpha_E: float, beta_E: float, gamma_E: float, zeta_E: float, alpha_I: float, beta_I: float, gamma_I: float, zeta_I: float)

   Bases: :py:obj:`src.params.Params.Params`

   This class contains Izhikevich parameters.

   * alpha describes the timescale of recovery;
   * beta describes the sensitivity of recovery to the subthreshold fluctuations of potential;
   * gamma describes the after-spike reset value of potential;
   * zeta describes the after-spike reset of recovery.

   :param peak_potential: potential at which spikes terminate.
   :type peak_potential: float

   :type alpha_E: float
   :type beta_E: float
   :type gamma_E: float
   :type zeta_E: float
   :type alpha_I: float
   :type beta_I: float
   :type gamma_I: float
   :type zeta_I: float
